name: focuss
description: Focus by disabling internet in Pomodoro intervals. Currently, only Mac OS X is supported, code for Windows and Linux support will be coming within two weeks; do not have access to those OSes at the time of this writing.

scripts.buildMac: echo "Compiling to a Mac application..." && ./node_modules/.bin/electron-packager app Focuss --platform darwin --asar true --icon ./app/img/icons/icon@5x.icns --out ./dist --overwrite

author: Bhargav R. Patel
